title: Hulu Xiongdi
synopsis: Legend has it that two demons were jailed in the Calabash Mountains, one a Scorpion spirit and the other a Snake spirit. However, years pass and a pangolin accidentally drills through the mountains and releases the demons.
related_anime: ['Xin Hulu Xiongdi', 'Hulu Xiongdi (Movie)', 'Hulu Xiao Jin Gang']
